title: How to listen to audio from 2 devices at once - Quora

response.answer_text: You need a mixer for this. Depending on the source containerization and what kind of output you are talking about will define the mixer you need. A simple versions would be something like this. MX41b Four Channel Mixer Note that this is a passive mixer, so you will need a headphone amp, self powered speaker system, or power amp and speaker combo to make your mixed signal. You could also use an active mixer with a headphone output, something like this. Mix Series Compact Mixers
